
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
AAAU <- read_csv("../data/nasdaq_prices/etfs/AAAU.csv")
```

```{r}
DailyPriceChange <- function(data){
  data %>% 
  mutate(DailyPriceChange = (Open - Close))
}
```

```{r}
DailyPriceChange(AAAU)
```
